name: Kourtney Game
description:
Kourtney Game 7 : is there any reason someone would get an ice pack and say hmm lol that's awesome haha lol this is so awesome right now lol just got my ice pack for my ass
Jacob Staal – Can confirm, I got my ice pack. Drew Doughty – Like lol I got my ice pack for my ass as well. Stephen Weiss – Is there some reason why someone who has gotten a little off the rails would get a little ice pack? Could that be the reason for Hurricanes center Erik Karlsson's teammates taking the ice and punching the ice? (Jennings) DL – I'm sure it could be. I don't think it was purposely. I don't think there was any intention to drink, but the timing wasn't exactly right. SS – I personally have received a lot of guys' ice packs. I've rolled one of my own. I've actually gagged one of them. An older guy sent me a TON of the stuff and asked if they would ice it after games. I told him no. He's like you want the whole bag? Six packs, and then I get cold. I did see him do that… about a week ago. Still, he's got it all lined up. He's not drinking. I'm not like throwing it at him like, "I have a bunch of NHL players in here trying to figure out how to drink these ice packs." Ducks
